author: Staff Reporter
text:
1,118 employees court arrest

Government employees who are on strike insisting their 20 point demands staged a road roko on Wednesday too in Tiruvannamalai and Cheyyar. As many as 1,118 of them were arrested and released later.

In Tiruvannamalai 529 employees including 431 women were arrested and in Cheyyar 589 employees including 158 women were arrested.

As the road roko agitation has lasted for more than a week and realising that there was no response, the employees decided to alter their plan of action.

They have decided to begin a ‘waiting agitation’ in front of the Collectorate from Thursday. – Staff Reporter
title: Girl child crushed under lorry
